scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development wp-scripts start src/js/index.js blocks/utilities/**/*.jsx blocks/components/**/*.jsx blocks/layout/**/*.jsx
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development wp-scripts start src/js/index.js blocks/utilities/**/*.jsx blocks/components/**/*.jsx blocks/layout/**/*.jsx
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production wp-scripts build src/js/index.js blocks/utilities/**/*.jsx blocks/components/**/*.jsx blocks/layout/**/*.jsx
scripts.build:test: NODE_ENV=production wp-scripts build src/js/index.js blocks/utilities/**/*.jsx blocks/components/**/*.jsx blocks/layout/**/*.jsx && cd test && backstop test --configPath=backstop.config.js
